content: ✨ new pattern alert ✨ check out my moorland puff hat a beautiful beanie made with dk weight yarn and a 4 5mm hook perfect for cozy days this hat is worked from the top down in one piece pair it with the matching scarf for a lovely gift set free patterns on my website or get ad-free pdfs in my shop **grab your free hat pattern from my website or purchase the ad-free pdf right here on ravelry ** a photo tutorial for the puff is included in the post and in the pdf version this is just one of the patterns included in our may hat of the month club collection join the club newsletter here https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d > this pattern will be available as a > free pdf download until may 27 2024 > at 11 59 pm est new york time > 23 59 for cal participants simply > add the pattern to your cart before > 11 59 pm est on may 27th and it will > show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on may 26 2024 at 8 00 pm est new york time 20 00 > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
